title: my KP logo...
content:
After playing around with different styles of logo using KP, this is the best one that i like best. What are your thoughts...?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130129025220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KP-460x200px_4951.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [KP-460x200px.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130129025220/http:/typophile.com/files/KP-460x200px.jpg) | 9.56 KB |
author: kpgrafix

comments.content:
Sorry...

but I think it reads XDP or XPD
Yeah, there's playfulness there, but I don't think it reads the way you intend.

Whatever you read the first letter (I read "K") the bigger problem here is that you DEFINITELY read the "D". It's the most visible of all three.

And I also see a fish here. Or maybe even a WWII bomb... :)

I want to see a clearer hierarchy between the foreground and background (the p over the black shape). Now all I see is a bomb since Litera pointed it out. I agree about there being a D. The backwards K feels awkward to me. Maybe a slab serif so you don't get fishyness. Hmmmm...

Robert ( litera ) makes some great points.

I agree with the others, your design seems too open to multiple interpretations. Try again!

see the bomb ... like the fish

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Motion Graphics Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20130129025220/http:/www.solid-creative.com/motion.htm)
thanks for the feedback guys... back to the drawing board for this one then. ill be back!

wow i havenet been here in a very long time... heres my updated 'logo'.

what do you guys think? thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130129025220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-kp_3572.jpg)

Are you somehow military oriented? Just joking.

This one does in did look like a military epaulette... :) But maybe you do want it to look like that. COmpared to your first design it did loose the "D problem". But now it could quite easily be read CP instead of KP. Actually I think if you hand it over to people, majority witll first say CP...  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
_Robert Koritnik_
It reads as CP to me too. Looks nice though.
